Pricing

Book a consultation Request information

Let's make sure my services are a good fit for your needs! Your first 30-minute consultation is 100% free with no pressure to commit. We'll chat about your goals and take a look at your existing website if you have one, and I'll suggest some ideas for where we can go next.

Website Design & Development

Every website is thoughtfully designed and tailored to your unique needs. From the beginning, I take the time to understand your industry, brand and message, working closely with you to craft a clear plan that brings your vision to life. Throughout the development process, I offer unlimited revisions to ensure that the final product exceeds your expectations.

$650 flat rate*

Includes:

  • Basic 4-page website Typically includes Home, About, Products/Services, and Contact pages — but you can choose whatever pages you need.
  • Responsive design for all devices Designed to look great on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
  • Unlimited revisions As many changes as you need until the final product is exactly what you want.
  • SEO optimization Improved search engine visibility.
  • Accessibility best practices Your website will follow accessibility guidelines to ensure all visitors can enjoy your site.
  • Integrated contact form [Optional] Allow visitors to easily get in touch with you directly from your website.

* 10% discount for nonprofits

Add a blog Add a blog to your site, including a blog feed and individual post pages.

Add duplicate pages For repeated pages with similar content — for example, multiple products that each have their own page. $150 for the first page and $20 for each additional page.

Services not offered

  • E-commerce and online ordering systems
    Embedding PayPal payment or similar is possible.
  • Online booking systems
    We can link to your external booking service.

Hosting & Maintenance

Hosting your own website and managing ongoing maintenance can be a hassle. I offer two subscription-based hosting & maintenance plans with month-to-month billing with the freedom to cancel or change plans at any time.

With either plan, you'll simply send me your edits whenever you need them and I'll take care of the rest, rendering your changes live on your website within 2 business days.

When choosing a plan, consider how often you'll need to update your website. Small edits like changing text content or swapping out an image take under 30 minutes. More complicated edits like adding a page section, moving elements around can take an hour or more. Blog posts are not counted towards the edits limit of your plan.

Additional edits beyond your plan's limit are billed at a rate of $45/hour.

Free

Host your website on your own terms

Not everyone needs hosting and maintenance services! If you want to host your new website yourself, I'll pass the source code along to you and you'll take it from there.

$50/month

Basic Hosting

Perfect for websites that don't need frequent changes and simple blog sites.

  • Domain registration
  • Daily monitoring
  • M-F technical support
  • Up to 1 hour of edits / month
  • 1 blog post / month

$150/month

Premium Hosting

Best for websites that need frequent updates and blogs that post more than once a month.

  • Domain registration
  • Daily monitoring
  • M-F technical support
  • Up to 5 hour of edits / month
  • Unlimited blog posts
